weekly_sprints: ${name} decides to run ${sprints_per_session} sprints ${sessions_per_week} times a week. ${subject} runs ${meters_per_sprint} meters each sprint. How many total meters does ${subject} run a week?
${name} does ${sprints_per_session} sprints ${sessions_per_week} times weekly. Each sprint is ${meters_per_sprint} meters. What's the total distance per week?
Every week, ${name} runs ${sprints_per_session} sprints ${sessions_per_week} times. Each sprint covers ${meters_per_sprint} meters. How many meters in total?
${name} practices sprinting ${sessions_per_week} times a week, doing ${sprints_per_session} sprints each time. If each sprint is ${meters_per_sprint} meters, what is the weekly total?
repeated_value: ${name} decides to run ${count} sprints ${count} times a week. ${subject} runs ${meters} meters each sprint. How many total meters does ${subject} run a week?
${name} does ${count} sprints ${count} times weekly. Each sprint is ${meters} meters. What's the total distance per week?
Every week, ${name} practices sprinting ${count} times, doing ${count} sprints each session. If each sprint covers ${meters} meters, what is ${subject} weekly total?
${name} runs ${count} sprints ${count} days a week. Each sprint is ${meters} meters. What is the total weekly distance?
weekly_laps: ${name} swims ${laps_per_session} laps ${sessions_per_week} times a week. Each lap is ${meters_per_lap} meters. How many meters does ${subject} swim weekly?
Every week, ${name} goes to the pool ${sessions_per_week} times and swims ${laps_per_session} laps each visit. If a lap is ${meters_per_lap} meters, what's the total distance?
